headline: General Dynamics (GD): Assessing Valuation After Blockbuster Earnings, Record Backlog, and New Share Price Highs
summary: General Dynamics (GD) kicked off investor conversations this week by delivering third-quarter results that surpassed estimates. The company’s strong performance across all divisions, with revenue and net income up, helped push shares to new highs. See our latest analysis for General Dynamics. After a blockbuster quarter and a record $109.9 billion backlog, General Dynamics shares surged to an all-time high, closing at $350.77. The company’s 34% share price return year-to-date and 18% total...

headline: GD Q3 Deep Dive: Aerospace Growth and Record Backlog Drive Positive Momentum
summary: Aerospace and defense company General Dynamics (NYSE:GD) beat Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales up 10.6% year on year to $12.91 billion. Its GAAP profit of $3.88 per share was 4.7% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
